column4: hey all... How can I tell/discover if my computer uses an EFI or is compatible with it?  Forgive the newbieness of this
If it's not a mac then even if it is EFI compatible, you probably don't want to use EFI.
why is that?  and no, it's an Asus k50
EFI implementations tend to be more buggy than BIOS implementations, and EFI doesn't really present many advantages over BIOS. Also, most FOSS developers that have to work with EFI dislike it.
point well taken... however, how can I discern the efi compatibility of my present laptop?
